entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd Timed Out #97735
  • ToString() function in HttpQSCollection inside of System.Web.HttpUtility does not URL encode names #97732
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Interlocked tests fail #97730
  • [NativeAOT] linux-arm bring up #97729
  • System.Security.Cryptography.OpenSsl 5.0.0 DLL for net461 targets .NET Framework 4.7 #97728
  • Massive performance downgrade when using latest .NET 8 linux runtime image caused by libssl3 #97727
  • IPv6 uri with leading zeros makes it IPv4 look like #97719
  • Provide subsets for AltJits for RISC-V and LoongArch64 #97712
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel client-user and pipeline types #97711
  • [API Proposal]: Add RuntimeHelpers.GetUserDefinedOperatorMethods for trimming-safe access to user-defined operators #97709
  • [NativeAOT] Publish NativeAOT Project With Configure Manager Can't Got Result #97707
  • `[LibraryImport]` throws `NotImplementedException` on `ref readonly` parameters #97706
    9.0.0
  • [mono] remove runtime support for cominterop #97703
    9.0.0
  • "Undefined symbols: _main" when trying to build static library for iOS using "library mode" #97700
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 13 Regressions on 1/25/2024 1:30:33 AM #97714
  • The SocketsHttpHandler cannot authenticate NTLM with the username format domain\samAccountName #97691
  • [API Proposal]: Generic Enumerable.Range method #97689
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'hwintrinsicChild->isContained()' in 'System.Numerics.Tensors.TensorPrimitives+ScaleBOperator #97688
  • Support adding links to Activity after it is created #97680
    Future

Closed

  • Unified Build behavior control update for emsdk #96909
  • Unified Build control update for cecil #96908
  • JIT: checked/release diffs #97638
    9.0.0
  • Implement Tensor Broadcasting #28377
    Future
  • Investigate performance of TensorArithmetic abstraction #28379
    Future
  • Sparse tensors should have a sparse-ness abstraction #28380
    Future
  • Add documentation markdown in the Tensor folder #28388
    Future
  • Meaning of negative index in System.Numerics.Tensors #35075
    Future
  • Logging source generator fails to compile if class has [DynamicallyAccessedMembers] #97498
    9.0.0
  • Scalability of System.Text.Json #97649
  • Support passing float[] (Single[]) to JS from .NET via [JSImport] #97633
  • Jump into Try/Catch Region #97693
  • Unnecessary buffer allocations when writing base64 values with `Utf8JsonWriter`. #97628
    Future
  • WASM UseAppHost=false but still host when I run #96955
  • [browser][MT] CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource #94486
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT codegen optimization opportunities #64242
    Future
  • [AssemblyLoadContext]: Restriction dlls for new Plugins #96207
  • [.NET6 fix port] AccessViolationException with PublishSingleFile #81181
  • Host tests should move out of the build and use the libraries test infrastructure #94271
  • GetRuntimeDirectory for WindowsDesktop apps #91182
  • OrderByDescending(...).First() changed which item is getting returned #97668
  • core 3.0 preview 6 broke out-of-process COM activation of non-embedded types in VB6 control #13066
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • STJ: Skip usage of indexer for KeyedCollection #97734
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Handle open types to appear in interface maps #97733
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Source built short stack support #97725
    source-build, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: remove fallthrough limitations from redundant branch optimizer #97722
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix passing of byref arguments in mono_gsharedvt_constrai… #97721
    NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for ref-readonly in the .NET interop source generators #97720
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97717
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.3
  • Take into account the local involved in GT_SWITCH for resolution #97713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/ARM] Emit correct unwind codes for VPOP #97710
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Save trimmed methods list to a file #97705
    needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97702
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not send to IDE the eval scripts #97701
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update ClaimsPrincipal.cs #97690
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add APIs for allocation-free delegate invocation list inspection #97683
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Improve BBJ_COND to BBJ_ALWAYS conversion in fgUpdateFlowGraph #97681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/9.0-preview1] [workloads][ios] Remove packages we no longer ship from net8 targets #97716
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 9.0.0
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0-preview1] Revert "Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0" #97679
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Pow, Exp2, Exp10, Cbrt, RootN, Hypot, Log(x,y), Log10 #97623
    area-System.Numerics
  • Fix S.T.Json's ArrayPool threshold #97704
    area-System.Text.Json
  • JIT: Remove optLoopCompactionFixupFallThrough #97670
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Perform SKI encode and decode using managed implementation #97708
    area-System.Security
  • [workloads][ios] Remove packages we no longer ship from net8 targets #97715
    area-Build-mono
  • For Debug, make sure we use right register selection heuristics to match with Release #97657
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix compilation error with generic type attributes #97613
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • adjust ownership of infrastructure-mono #97655
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Fix some cases using `BasicBlock::bbFallsThrough` #97699
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_DA_4A to IF_SVE_DC_3A group #97645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [NativeAOT] ARM: Implement the EABI #97604
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove installer/tests/Assets/TestUtils/SDKLookup #97583
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Fix DangerousAddRef usage #97394
    area-System.Security
  • Add tests for Task.WhenAll #93619
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Add InvokeSpanIntoSpan helper for TensorPrimitives.SinCos{Pi} #97682
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Use DivRem in Decimal.DecCalc #97619
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • libraries/tests: skip System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests when DotNetBuildFromSource. #97697
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Remove buffer copy when writing base64 JSON value #97687
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Put scalar stack args with sign extension #97662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tests] Enable ILStrip after AOT compilation for library tests #88167
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][llvm] Avoid linking a bblock ending with a NOT_REACHABLE with … #97660
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Delete most of InteropExtensions #97685
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete Windows ARM32 support #97686
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete gcdump.cpp and related headers #97684
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: don't ask for all write barrer helpers for AOT #97677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Enable `DerivedCancellationTokenSource`, `AbandonExisting` #97545
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix errors in crosgen2 for risc-v #97368
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix stability of OrderByDescending.Last #97672
    area-System.Linq
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives shift and rotate operators #97361
    area-System.Numerics

Updated

  • Add the barebones support for using embedded masking with AVX512 #97675
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark all base types and interfaces as RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Return all error messages instead of throwing on the first error in linker tests #97605
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove Unrestored/UnrestoredTypeKey flags #97674
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [JsonSerializer] Add support for out-of-order metadata reads. #97474
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][interp] Fix inlining of ldarga #97650
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.3
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • mark-ro-instrumentation #97482
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test TotalOrderIeee754ComparerTests: Fix NFloat - NaN testcases for RISC-V #97340
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default loop peeling phase #97517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [browser] improve behavior after exit, better docs #97651
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [browser][mt] Unify multithreading switches #97560
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Enable native AOT for non-portable crossgen2 #97536
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update constant prop to only consider certain hwintrinsics #97616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
